beans.description:
This adaptor does the following...
* reads all files in a directory 'inputs' where the filenames match the regex stuff[0-9].txt * outputs to stdout
It is designed to illustrate the basic structure of a directory reader adaptor
Run it like this...
java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringAdaptor -config directory-read-connector.xml -bean Adaptor
You need the following in your classpath
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar
writes to stdout

bean.description: Illustrate a basic directory reader adaptor. * reads all files in a directory input/inputs whose filenames match the regex stuff[0-9].txt * outputs to stdout
This creates the simple pipeline DirectoryReader -> Writer.
This writer writes data to stdout.
